member.summary: An element anchored to the right-hand area of a screen that provides streamer level controls. Should be off-screen.

member.summary: A beatmap choice by a team from a tournament's map pool.

member.summary: Holds the complete data required to operate the tournament system.

member.summary: A collection of two teams competing in a head-to-head match.

member.name: F:osu.Game.Tournament.Models.TournamentMatch.Current
member.summary: Should not be set directly. Use LadderInfo.CurrentMatch.Value = this instead.

member.name: M:osu.Game.Tournament.Models.TournamentMatch.CancelMatchStart
member.summary: Remove scores from the match, in case of a false click or false start.

member.name: M:osu.Game.Tournament.Models.TournamentMatch.StartMatch
member.summary: Initialise this match with zeroed scores. Will be a noop if either team is not present.

member.name: T:osu.Game.Tournament.Models.TournamentProgression
member.summary: A mapping between two es. Used for serialisation exclusively.

member.name: T:osu.Game.Tournament.Models.TournamentRound
member.summary: A tournament round, containing many matches, generally executed in a short time period.

member.name: T:osu.Game.Tournament.Models.TournamentTeam
member.summary: A team representation. For official tournaments this is generally a country.

member.name: F:osu.Game.Tournament.Models.TournamentTeam.FullName
member.summary: The name of this team.

member.summary: Name of the file containing the flag.

member.name: F:osu.Game.Tournament.Models.TournamentTeam.Acronym
member.summary: Short acronym which appears in the group boxes post-selection.

member.summary: Number of lines in the visualiser.

member.summary: Time offset.
